HomePage.title: Vitapsyche
HomePage.heroDescription: Our platform offers personalized psychological assessments, direct access to doctors, a mental health product store, and educational content to promote awareness and self-understanding.

psychologicalAssessment.title: Psychological assessment:
psychologicalAssessment.description: Through advanced psychological tests and machine learning models, the platform will be able to determine the user’s psychological state and provide recommendations based on the results.

communicationWithDoctors.title: Communication with doctors:
communicationWithDoctors.description: The platform allows users to communicate directly with psychologists through an integrated chat system and book appointments for consultations.

doctorRecommendations.title: Doctor recommendations:
doctorRecommendations.description: Provide personalized recommendations to users based on their psychological assessments and preferences.

saleOfProductsAndMedicines.title: Sale of products and medicines:
saleOfProductsAndMedicines.description: Provide a platform for selling products and medicines related to mental health and psychotherapy. Dissemination of knowledge: Provide articles and educational content that support mental health and help users understand themselves better.

AboutUs.description: We are a collaborative team of doctors, programmers, and psychotherapists dedicated to improving mental health. Our goal is to help individuals understand their thoughts, feelings, and behaviors while developing effective strategies to tackle the mental health challenges they encounter. We also aim to identify the optimal treatment methods for a wide range of mental health conditions.
AboutUs.supervisorHeading: Under the guidance of our project supervisor:
AboutUs.teamHeading: Executed by the collaborative efforts of our team:

contactUs.heading: You are our priority
contactUs.subheading: We appreciate your comments and inquiries! Feel free to contact us.
contactUs.startChat: Say something to start a live chat!
contactUs.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us! Your message has been submitted successfully.

Products.title: Vitapsyche Products
Products.description: Does stress make you angry and complaining? These products may help you relieve stress and restore peace of mind in your busy life.

modal.defaultMessage: Payment has been successfully completed. Thank you!

hero.title: Join Vitapsyche now and make your own contribution
hero.description: Enjoy practicing psychotherapy online; now you can communicate with thousands of customers from all over the world privately. Join us with other psychiatrists and psychologists worldwide.

items.title: Online Sessions
items.description: Availability to work from anywhere saving time, effort and cost.

items.title: Better Communication
items.description: Availability to communicate with customers via a text chat or via a video call.

items.title: Universal Therapy
items.description: We serve clients from all over the world and you will get paid for both

items.title: Client history
items.description: Securely keep notes and medical reports for your clients

items.title: Recorded Notes and tests
items.description: Securely keep notes and medical reports for your clients

steps.title: Hurry up and reserve your place with us
steps.step4: Add time slots to run sessions. Join now as a therapist

clinicalPsychologists.title: For Clinical Psychologists:
requirements: Master's of Science or Arts (MSc/MA) in Clinical Psychology.

counselingPsychologists.title: For Counseling Psychologists:
requirements: Masters of Science or Arts (MSc/MA) in Counseling Psychology.

tests.pageDescription: Gain insights into your mental well-being through our scientifically-validated assessments. Remember, these tests are tools for understanding, not final diagnoses.
tests.premiumDescription: Access our advanced psychological assessments with detailed professional analysis and personalized recommendations.

test.noQuestions: No questions available for this test.
test.instructions: Please read the test items carefully and answer based on the past two weeks. There's no right or wrong answer.
test.question: Question

premiumTestPage.notFoundMessage: The premium test you're looking for doesn't exist or might have been moved.
premiumTestPage.underMaintenanceMessage: This premium test is currently being updated. Please check back later.
premiumTestPage.instructions: Please read each question carefully and answer based on your experiences over the past two weeks. There are no right or wrong answers.

testResults.dontFaceAlone: Don't face your challenges alone. Professional help is available!

cognitiveDistortions.title: Cognitive Distortions Test Results
cognitiveDistortions.importantNoteText: This assessment evaluates 12 different types of cognitive distortions. Each score indicates the strength of that particular thinking pattern. This is a screening tool and not a diagnostic instrument.
cognitiveDistortions.moderateSeverityDesc: May benefit from awareness and monitoring

personalityDisorders.title: Test Results Summary
personalityDisorders.noIndicators: No significant personality disorder indicators found
personalityDisorders.importantNoteText: This screening tool provides initial insights but is not a diagnostic instrument. A proper diagnosis can only be made by a qualified mental health professional.
scoreInterpretationPoints: "Present" indicates that responses meet the threshold for further evaluation
"Not Present" suggests symptoms may not be clinically significant
Multiple indicators may suggest overlapping traits or complex presentations
